text: What type of platform is provided by Now Platform?
What is record producer?
options: Record producer is a form of automated test to allow data verification
Record producer is a scheduled job that creates records in table automatically
Record producer allows customers to fill a form that will be translated into a task-based record
Record producer allows fulfiller users to create records in the task table
correctAnswers: Record producer allows customers to fill a form that will be translated into a task-based record

text: Which table is used to store configuration items?
If a table is extended but itself is not extending another table, it is called a ---------.
Which of the following should you use in order to run automated tests on ServiceNow?
List Editor has the feature that allows editing a field on multiple rows.
You are designing a flow. You created an action on the incident record and you need to make use of this record in a subsequent action. Which of the following can be useful?
Any table in ServiceNow can be extended.
If you need to create a visual task board (VTB) as your personal organizer and create tasks of any type and freely adding/removing cards and lanes, then the VTB type you should use is Flexible.
_______ is a field where you can ask natural language questions about the trends and health of your processes.
Which of the following statements is correct regarding knowledge management workflows?
options: One workflow should be used for all knowledge bases
The same workflow that is used for publishing should be used for retirement
There are workflows available OOTB but you can create your own
None of the listed answers is correct
Workflows can be used only for publishing article but not for retirement
correctAnswers: There are workflows available OOTB but you can create your own

text: Which application scope is used to identify applications created before application scoping?
options: No application scope is assigned to applications that were created prior to application scoping

text: What access does a user need to be able to import articles to a knowledge base?

A manager wants to view a snapshot of month end Sales performance data, as compared to Sales targets. In addition, the manager wants to be able to see those monthly numbers trended over time and forecasted into the future. What capability do you suggest for this manager?
options: Scheduled Reports, a custom snapshot table, and a Projection report
Scheduled Reports, a custom snapshot table, and a Trend report

text: An IT user calls the service desk because they need to work on task records. All they can see is Self Service on their homepage when they login to the ServiceNow instance. What issue could explain this? (Select 2 answers)
options: Their user account was not approved by their manager
Their user account does not belong to any groups, which contain the itil role
Their user account is not logged in properly
Their user account does not have itil role
Their user account failed LDAP authentication
correctAnswers: Their user account does not belong to any groups, which contain the itil role
Their user account does not have itil role

text: What are advantages of using Flow Designer? (Choose 4 answers)
When moving a homepage or dashboard between instances, what must you remember?
options: They are automatically added to the update set
Create a separate update set for them
They can be moved using ZIP files
They cannot be moved via XML
Manually add them to the update set
They cannot be moved via update set
correctAnswers: Manually add them to the update set

text: What policies are applied to all data entered into the platform: via form (UI), Import Sets, or Web Services?
Which flow components allow you to specify when a flow should be run?
If you have the Impersonate role, what type of user are you not able to impersonate?
Which ServiceNow resource can be used as a blueprint to map your IT Services to ServiceNow?
What tool allows you to drag and drop to specify links between source fields on an Import Set table and destination fields on any ServiceNow table?
What are the steps for importing data using an import set?
options: Identify source; Import transform map; Run transformer; Verify import
Load the data; Create transform map; Transform data; Clean up import table
Select source file; Run AutoMap; Transform data; Clean up target table
Set up LDAP; Test map; Create update set; Run import; Apply update set
correctAnswers: Load the data; Create transform map; Transform data; Clean up import table

text:
You are creating a catalog item for ordering a new desktop computer. The computers have these options:
Color: Black or Silver
RAM: 32 MB or 64 MB
Keyboard: Standard or Ergonomic
Monitor: 24 inch or 32 inch
How would you add these options to the catalog item form?

Here is an example of the criteria set for a Knowledge Base.
· Companies: ACME North America
· Departments: HR
· Groups: ACME Managers
· Match All: Yes
In this example, what user would have access to this Knowledge Base?
options: Members of the ACME Managers group, and HR department, regardless of geography
Employee of ACME North America, who are members of HR Department or the ACME Managers group
Members of the ACME Manager group, who are also members of the HR Department and part of ACME North America
Users which are members of either ACME North America, or HR Department, or ACME Managers group.
correctAnswers: Members of the ACME Manager group, who are also members of the HR Department and part of ACME North America

text: For a customer's inventory application, several inventory specifications fields are needed on an inventory ticket. These tickets will be assigned to inventory support team members. How would you start to implement this requirement?
options: Create inventory table as a new base Table. Then add inventory specifications fields, as needed
Create inventory table with the inventory specification fields. Then create view between the inventory and the Task table
Create inventory table with the inventory specification fields. Then create many to many relationships between the inventory and the Task table
Create inventory table as an extended table from the Task Table. Then add the inventory specification fields, as needed.
correctAnswers: Create inventory table as an extended table from the Task Table. Then add the inventory specification fields, as needed.

text: What attributes you can manage using System Properties > Basic Configuration UI16 (Choose 5 answer)
Which type of scripts run in the browser?
Which type of field allows you to enter freely using letters, numbers, and special characters?
What is a set of conditions applied to a table list to show a subset of the data?
Which admin role is required to make changes to High Security Settings?
How are users and groups related
When importing data, what happens to imported rows, if no coalesce field is specified?
options: All rows are treated as new records, but errors will be flagged in the import log
Duplicate rows are rejected from the import
All rows are treated as new records. No existing records are updated
All rows are rejected from the import, as coalesce field is required
correctAnswers: All rows are treated as new records. No existing records are updated

text: Which one of the following statement applies to a set of fields when they are coalesced during an import?
options: If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the system does not create a Transform Map
If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the system creates a new record
If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
correctAnswers: If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported

text: What can be used to automatically populate fields in a form?

A Service Catalog project will involve building 80 catalog items. For each of the catalog items, the following fields will be mandatory on the forms:
· Requested for
· Requested by
· Approving manager
· Delivery Instructions
All of the other variables will be specific to the individual catalog item. What features would you use when designing the catalog item form?
options: Create an Order Guide, which includes all variables, then copy and hide variables as needed.
Create one Variable Set for the four variables, then add that variable set to each of the 80 catalog items
Create a Variable Set Template, then apply to all of the catalog items
Create a Record Producer that contains the four fields, then add to the record producer related list on the Catalog Items
Create a Flow Designer Action, with Variable Set Data Pill, then apply flow to all of the 80 catalog items
correctAnswers: Create one Variable Set for the four variables, then add that variable set to each of the 80 catalog items

text: Which of the following protects applications by identifying and restricting access to available files and data?
A manager wants to run a report showing how many Service Requests have been fulfilled for Business Cards, since the beginning of the year. What table would they select for building this report?
Which helps the agents to have real-time collaboration with others based around a Workspace task-based or interaction-based record?
Your customer requires that they be able to monitor which users are performing impersonations in their instance. What would you do to meet that requirement?
options: Add the role Log Write [an_log_write] to the Impersonator Group
Create user update set for impersonation tracking
On the Impersonator role record, right click and select Create Log
From User Icon, select Elevate Roles

text: Which feature assists in understanding the Service Portal user experience better?
What is the most important thing to remember about activating a Plugin?
options: Tick the box for adding demo data
Plugins once installed cannot be uninstalled
Submit a HI ticket to get authorization
Plugins are prohibited in personal developer instances
correctAnswers: Plugins once installed cannot be uninstalled

text: Which operation is a record type access control list (ACL) that governs reports in dashboards and are enabled by default?
Which role can administrators grant to users in order for them to view the configuration and execution details of only flows and subflows?
The display sequence is controlled in the Service Catalog Item using which of the following?
options: The Default Value field in the Catalog Item form
The Sequence field in the Catalog Item form
The Order field in the Variable form
The Choice field in the Variable form
correctAnswers: The Order field in the Variable form

text: Which Chatbot on the Now Platform allows you to send notifications directly to Slack and Microsoft Teams users?

CMDB Data Manager is a wizard-like tool that provides a comprehensive solution for managing configuration items. Which of the following indicates how CMDB Data Manager operates? Select 2 Answers from the below options.
options: It rarely copes with rapid changes in a cloud-based world.
It helps maintain the CMDB healthy and efficient.
It can only manage small to medium CMDBS.
correctAnswers: It helps maintain the CMDB healthy and efficient.

text: Which script runs when a record is displayed, inserted, updated, deleted or when a table is queried?
What catalog tool would you like to create a catalog item or record producer?
What can be set up to auto-assign all new Hardware category Incidents to a particular group? Select 3 Answers from the below options.
What type of relationship is recommended between Incident and SLA tables to report on incidents resolved by SLA per incident category?
When a flow runs an action, if generates a runtime value, which stays the same for the duration of the flow. What is the name of the runtime value?
